statements: UPDATE network_traffic_data SET threat_level = 3, timestamp = '2022-03-15 08:00:00' WHERE device_id = 1
UPDATE network_traffic_data SET ip_address = '192.168.1.100', mac_address = '00:1A:2B:3C:4D:5E' WHERE device_id = 2
UPDATE network_traffic_data SET threat_level = 3, timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:30:00' WHERE device_id = 1
UPDATE network_traffic_data SET ip_address = '192.168.1.10', mac_address = '00:11:22:33:44:55' WHERE device_id = 2
UPDATE NetworkTrafficData SET packet_size = 1500 WHERE device_id = 101 AND timestamp = '2022-03-15 10:30:00';
UPDATE SecurityThreats SET description = 'Malware attack detected' WHERE threat_id = 500 AND timestamp = '2022-03-14 15:45:00' AND threat_level = 'High';
UPDATE NetworkTrafficData SET protocol = 'UDP' WHERE device_id = 1 AND source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
UPDATE SecurityThreats SET description = 'Malicious attack detected' WHERE threat_id = 5;
UPDATE NetworkDevices SET device_name = 'Router1' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE SecurityAlerts SET threat_level = 'HIGH', description = 'Unauthorized access attempt' WHERE alert_id = 1;
UPDATE NetworkDevices SET device_name='Router1', last_seen='2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE device_id=1;
UPDATE SecurityAlerts SET threat_level='High', description='Unauthorized access detected' WHERE alert_id=5;
UPDATE network_traffic SET data_size = 1500 WHERE device_id = 101;
UPDATE threat_data SET threat_level = 5, threat_description = 'New description' WHERE threat_id = 201;
UPDATE network_traffic SET data_size = 1500 WHERE device_id = 12345 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
UPDATE security_events SET event_description = 'Unauthorized access detected' WHERE event_type = 'Hacking' AND timestamp < '2022-03-01'
UPDATE NetworkDevices SET connection_status = TRUE WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE Users SET role = 'Admin' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE NetworkDevices SET connection_status = FALSE WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE Users SET role = 'admin', email = 'admin@example.com' WHERE user_id = 3;
